author: markekraus
body:
## PR Summary

* Extends `-SkipHeaderValidation` to work with `-ContentType` to allow `Content-Type` headers which are not standards compliant,
* moves existing `-SkipHeaderValidation` tests to a context
* Adds tests
* closes #6002 

Documentation will need to be updated to reflect that `-SkipHeaderValidation` works with  `-ContentType`
